physical_appearance:The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features a body of water with several ships and boats on it
 which takes up about four-fifths of the photograph from the right hand side. There is a war memorial located on the land mass
 as shown at the left hand side of the photograph. It is a shaped like a tall vertical tower and there are steps leading to its base. There are numerous trees behind it
 and several roofed buildings can be seen in the background of the photograph as well.

metadata.title_text: Cenotaph and Harbour Photography Album (donation from Anthony Robert Saint Claire)
metadata.physical_appearance: The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features a body of water with several ships and boats on it, which takes up about four-fifths of the photograph from the right hand side. There is a war memorial located on the land mass, as shown at the left hand side of the photograph. It is a shaped like a tall vertical tower and there are steps leading to its base. There are numerous trees behind it, and several roofed buildings can be seen in the background of the photograph as well.
metadata.subject_terms_2: Black-and-white photography Singapore River (Singapore) Harbours War memorials
